Text:
For the app with the patch try
http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3892345/

Without the patch it's kinda useless.

From the readme:

Important Note
If you do not have a full, active .Mac account, Backup 3 functionality is limited. If you have a .Mac trial account, you are limited to 100MB (megabytes) per backup.
If you have .mac account you don't need any crack because it works without any. Its included in .mac, I guess.
My MAC claims this one is a corrupted archive and will not mount the image.  Something to do with the crack?
